about_the_game:
[Game Story]

Mariana , a magician who has been a bounty hunter for 20 years.
A highly skilled individual who always completes the quests she takes on.
Dislikes people and has a high pride; she has always worked alone.
However, during a certain mission, she is hit by a powerful curse.
To break the curse, she is told that she must ingest a large amount of semen from various species within a limited time.

[Features]

  • Events change according to the passage of time, both during the day and at night!
  • This is a fantasy short battles RPG featuring a cold mature woman forced into leeching .
  • When the erotic increased,more sex events will happen.
  • You can check erotic state on the menu immediately.
  • Two endings, including a virgin ending
  • Toggle for on/off of sectional views.

[Characters]

Magician：Mariana (35 years old)　
CV:綾奈まりあ

She has been a bounty hunter for 20 years.
A highly skilled individual who always completes the quests she takes on.
Dislikes people and has a high pride; she has always worked alone.
During a certain mission,she is hit by a powerful curse.
To break the curse, she is told that she must ingest a large amount of semen from various species within a limited time.

Receptionist: Rosalie (37 years old)
CV:ありがた～い私

Works at the guild where the protagonist frequents.
She has been working there for 20 years and is like a colleague to the main character.
She is a warm and caring person.
Her husband, who works in the knight order, is busy,
and they don't get to see each other often. (Sex events: 2)

content_descriptors.notes: This work contains sexual violence, sexual assault, consensual/non-consensual sex and genital nudity and is not intended for all ages. All characters in the play are over the age of 20.

name: Solo leeching~35-Year-Old Magician Journey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
